metadata.titleEn: Whole-rock and mineral geochemical compositions of  leucogranite and pegmatite in Xiaru dome, Xizang, China
metadata.titleCn: 中国西藏夏如穹隆淡色花岗岩和伟晶岩全岩及矿物地球化学数据
metadata.description: including muscovite granite with the occurrence of wolframite,muscovite granite with Nb⁃Ta⁃W oxide minerals and pegmatite with the occurrence of columbite⁃group minerals. Meanwhile,the typical muscovite granite without any rare ⁃ metal minerals (barren muscovite granite hereafter) is selected for comparison. Major and trace elements of whole rock geochemistry, the occurrence, major and trace elements of rock forming minerals and accessory minerals are comparable. The whole rock compositions were analyzed by XRF adn ICP-MS. The chemical compositions of minerals were analyzed by EMP and LA-ICPMS. It is suggested that whole ⁃ rock composition is indicative for the fluid activity,while the composition characteristics of muscovite,tourmaline and garnet are indicative for the process and degree of the magma evolution.
metadata.descriptionCn: 喜马拉雅夏如岩体中出现矿化痕迹的样品，包括含黑钨矿的白云母花岗岩、含有铌钽钨氧化物的白云母花岗岩和含有铌钽氧化物的伟晶岩，同时还选取典型的未出现稀有金属矿物的白云母花岗岩（简称未矿化白云母花岗岩）进行对比研究 . 数据主要包括全岩地球化学主量和微量元素成分，造岩矿物和副矿物的主量和微量元素成分 . 主要通过XRF和ICP-MS获得全岩主量和微量数据，通过EMPA和LA-ICPMS获得矿物主量和微量数据，精度优于10%。本次研究表明花岗岩-伟晶岩全岩成分指示流体活动更有效，而白云母、电气石和石榴子石的成分特征指示岩浆演化过程和演化程度更有效 .
metadata.instructions: Data stored in Excel format.File name called "WRMajTr", on behalf of the whole rock of main trace elements, file name, called "MusMajTra", on behalf of the white mica main trace elements data, file name "GarMajTra", on behalf of the garnet main trace elements data, file name "TurMajTra", on behalf of tourmaline main trace elements data, file name "ZrnMajTra", on behalf of the main elements zircon data.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据以Excel格式存储。文件名称为"WRMajTr"，代表全岩主微量元素，文件名称为"MusMajTra"，代表白云母主微量元素数据，文件名称"GarMajTra"，代表石榴石主微量元素数据，文件名称"TurMajTra"，代表电气石主微量元素数据，文件名称"ZrnMajTra"，代表锆石主量元素数据。

literatureList.titleCn: 喜马拉雅夏如淡色花岗岩⁃伟晶岩的矿物学特征

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific characteristics of granites and pegmatites are indicated by whole-rock geochemical data in this domain?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在这一领域，整体岩石地球化学数据指示了花岗岩和伟晶岩的特定特征。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: fluid activity, major and trace element compositions, precision better than 10%
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 流体活动，主量和微量元素组成，精度优于10%

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different rock samples were analyzed using XRF and ICP-MS for their major and trace element compositions?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用XRF和ICP-MS分析了多少种不同的岩石样品以获取其主要和微量元素成分？
Quantification.AnswerEn: The original answer does not provide a numerical value for the number of rock samples analyzed. Therefore, there is no quantifiable information to extract or refine.
Quantification.AnswerCn: 原始答案没有提供分析岩石样本的数量。因此，没有可提取或细化的量化信息。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about fluid activity and magmatic evolution processes from the geochemical data collected using XRF, ICP-MS, EMPA, and LA-ICPMS techniques?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以从使用XRF、ICP-MS、EMPA和LA-ICPMS技术收集的地球化学数据中推断出流体活动和岩浆演化过程。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geochemical data collected suggests that whole-rock compositions of granite-pegmatite are more effective indicators of fluid activity, while the compositional characteristics of muscovite, tourmaline, and garnet more effectively indicate magmatic evolution processes and degrees of evolution.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 收集的地球化学数据表明，花岗岩-伟晶岩的全岩成分是流体活动的更有效指示，而白云母、碧玺和石榴石的成分特征更有效地指示了岩浆演化过程和演化程度。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variations in the geochemical data collected from samples of muscovite granite and pegmatite in the Xiaru Dome, and how do these variations affect the interpretation of fluid activity and magmatic evolution?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致来自Xiaru Dome的白云母花岗岩和伟晶岩样品的地球化学数据变化的原因是什么，这些变化如何影响流体活动和岩浆演化的解释？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Variations in geochemical data can be caused by differences in the composition of the muscovite granite and pegmatite, which may include the presence of mineralization indicators such as black tungsten ore and niobium-tantalum-tungsten oxides. These changes can affect the interpretation of fluid activity and magmatic evolution because the whole-rock composition suggests fluid activity, while the composition of minerals like muscovite, tourmaline, and garnet better indicates the magmatic evolution process and degree.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 地球化学数据的变化可能是由于白云母花岗岩和伟晶岩的成分差异造成的，这可能包括黑钨矿和铌-钽-钨氧化物等矿化指示物的存在。这些变化可能会影响流体活动和岩浆演化的解释，因为整体岩石成分暗示了流体活动，而白云母、电气石和石榴石等矿物的成分则更好地指示了岩浆演化过程和程度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of using XRF and ICP-MS for obtaining whole-rock major and trace element data in terms of data accuracy and reliability?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用XRF和ICP-MS获取全岩主要和微量元素数据的潜在结果在数据准确性和可靠性方面是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using XRF and ICP-MS for obtaining whole-rock major and trace element data can result in high accuracy and reliability, with precision better than 10%. This allows for effective indication of fluid activity in granite-pegmatite whole-rock compositions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用XRF和ICP-MS获得全岩主要和微量元素数据可以实现高精度和可靠性，精度优于10%。这使得有效指示花岗岩-伟晶岩全岩成分中的流体活动成为可能。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What techniques and instruments are utilized for collecting geochemical data from mineral samples in the context of studying granite and pegmatite rock formations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在研究花岗岩和伟晶岩岩石形成的背景下，收集矿物样品的地球化学数据所使用的技术和仪器包括哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The geochemical data collection involves using X-ray Fluorescence (XRF) and Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry (ICP-MS) for obtaining whole-rock major and trace element data. Electron Microprobe Analysis (EMPA) and Laser Ablation Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) are employed to acquire the major and trace element data of minerals. These methods provide precision better than 10%.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 地球化学数据收集涉及使用X射线荧光（XRF）和电感耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）来获取全岩主要和微量元素数据。电子探针分析（EMPA）和激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）用于获取矿物的主要和微量元素数据。这些方法提供的精度优于10%。
